messages.text: Hey music devs! Should this be updated for this year? <https://github.com/JuliaMusic/JuliaMusic_documentation.jl/issues/10>

elements.text: Hey music devs! Should this be updated for this year?

messages.text: Hey, yes sure please feel free to help, I definitely need assistance here as I'm spreading myself too thin in JuliaDynamics. Furthermore I'd like some assistance in reviewing PRs in MusicProcessing.jl... :slightly_smiling_face:

messages.text: Thanks I will try as much.. So my question is, should that issue tracker be updated? Has there been any progress on those issues over the year? If not, I can work on them <@U8J1KET6K>

messages.text: A couple of people have been helping with the first task, but it still needs a bit more work for completion. To my knowledge <@U69AX2SP7> has done some recent updates to Mplay.jl, however I'm not sure if he has progressed with integration with the artifacts system. I don't think there has been notable progress on the remaining tasks.

messages.text: <@U8J1KET6K> `Mplay` runs fine with Julia 1.6.0 or 1.7.0-DEV.759 (2021-03-26). Concerning the artifacts system, pls see my comments <https://github.com/JuliaMusic/JuliaMusic_documentation.jl/issues/10#issuecomment-808208846|here>.
